dct_title_s: Hammond's new guide map of Manhattan and the Bronx
dct_description_sm: Includes street and avenue index.; "With new street directory indexing all streets and avenue by means of marginal references on map and giving corner numbers for the longer throughfares and important cross streets"--Cover.
